languages.text: "...А-а-а, вот и наш главный свидетель. Вольный Торговец — собственной персоной". {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас холодный взгляд.{/n} "Если предыдущих доказательств вам было недостаточно, {mf|его|ее} показания поставят финальную точку в этом запутанном деле, полном лжи, ереси и клятвопреступлений".

traits.locale_text: "...А-а-а, вот и наш главный свидетель. Вольный Торговец — собственной персоной". {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас мрачный, холодный взгляд.{/n} "Если предыдущих доказательств вам было недостаточно, {mf|его|ее} показания поствят финальную точку в этом запутанном деле, полном лжи, ереси и клятвопреступлений".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."
languages.original_text: "...А-а-а, вот и наш главный свидетель. Вольный Торговец — собственной персоной". {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас холодный взгляд.{/n} "Если предыдущих доказательств вам было недостаточно, {mf|его|ее} показания поставят финальную точку в этом запутанном деле, полном лжи, ереси и клятвопреступлений".

traits.locale_text: "...And here comes our chief witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}". {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...And here comes our chief witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}". {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Et voici notre témoin principal, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne, {n}annonce Heinrix en vous jetant un regard glacial.{/n} Si les preuves qui vous ont été présentées n'étaient pas suffisantes, son témoignage viendra conclure cette troublante affaire de parjure, de mensonges et d'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Et voici notre témoin principal, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne,{n}annonce Heinrix en vous jetant un regard glacial.{/n} Si les preuves qui vous ont été présentées n'étaient pas suffisantes, son témoignage viendra conclure cette troublante affaire de parjure, de mensonges et d'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “……现在，有请我们的主要证人，行商浪人本人。”{n}海因里希冷冷地看了你一眼。{/n}“如果刚刚提出的证据还不足以说服您，{mf|他|她}的证词会带来真相，让这个困惑的案件就此结案。这个案件充满了谎言、违誓之举与异端恶行。”
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: “……现在，有请我们的主要证人，行商浪人本人。”{n}海因里希冷冷地看了你一眼。{/n}“如果刚刚提出的证据还不足以说服您，{mf|他|她}的证词会带来真相，让这个困惑的案件就此结案。这个案件充满了谎言、违誓之举与异端恶行。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「…では主要な証人である、自由開拓者にご登壇いただこう」{n}ハインリックスはあなたに冷たい視線を送った。{/n}「提示された証拠だけでは不十分だというのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}の証言が、宣誓違反、嘘、異端だらけのこの混乱した事件を終わらせるだろう」
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「…では主要な証人である、自由開拓者にご登壇いただこう」{n}ハインリックスはあなたに冷たい視線を送った。{/n}「提示された証拠だけでは不十分だというのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}の証言が、宣誓違反、嘘、異端だらけのこの混乱した事件を終わらせるだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "... Als Nächstes kommt {mf|unser Hauptzeuge|unsere Hauptzeugin}, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich." {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen kalten Blick zu.{/n} "Wenn die vorgelegten Beweise nicht ausreichen, um Euch zu überzeugen, wird {mf|seine|ihre} Aussage Licht in diesen unübersichtlichen Fall voller gebrochener Eide, Lügen und Ketzerei bringen."
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: "... Als Nächstes kommt {mf|unser Hauptzeuge|unsere Hauptzeugin}, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich." {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen kalten Blick zu.{/n} "Wenn die vorgelegten Beweise nicht ausreichen, um Euch zu überzeugen, wird {mf|seine|ihre} Aussage Licht in diesen unübersichtlichen Fall voller gebrochener Eide, Lügen und Ketzerei bringen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «... que suba al estrado nuestro testigo principal, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona». {n}Heinrix te mira con frialdad.{/n} «Si las pruebas presentadas no bastan para convencerles, su testimonio servirá para poner fin a este caso tan ambiguo y lleno de perjurios, mentiras y herejía».
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: «... que suba al estrado nuestro testigo principal, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en persona». {n}Heinrix te mira con frialdad.{/n} «Si las pruebas presentadas no bastan para convencerles, su testimonio servirá para poner fin a este caso tan ambiguo y lleno de perjurios, mentiras y herejía».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Esas tanığımız geliyor: Hür Tacir'in ta kendisi." {n}Heinrix sana soğuk bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sunulan deliller sizin için yeterince ikna edici değilse kendisinin ifadesi; bozulan yeminlerle, yalanlarla ve kâfirliklerle dolu bu çetrefilli davaya son noktayı koyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "...And here comes our principal witness, the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}." {n}Heinrix gives you a cold look.{/n} "If the presented evidence was not enough to convince you, {mf|his|her} testimony will conclude this confusing case, full of oath-breaking, lies, and heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Esas tanığımız geliyor: Bizzat Hür Tacir'in kendisi." {n}Heinrix sana soğuk bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sunulan deliller sizin için yeterince ikna edici olmamışsa, onun ifadesi, bozulan yeminlerle, yalanlarla ve kâfirliklerle dolu bu çetrefilli davaya son noktayı koyacaktır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
